response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds immense significance and worth, estimated at over $1,500,000 to me, reflecting its rarity, craftsmanship, and historical importance. I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $1,800,000, hoping to find a true admirer who will appreciate and cherish it as much as I have. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if there's any way I can assist you in making your decision.", "product_price": 1800000}
